title: SENIOR FINANCIAL ANALYST at Heller Technologies (Miami, FL)
text: Source: A Mighty River Reference # : 12-00135 Title : SENIOR FINANCIAL ANALYST Location : Miami, FL Position Type : Direct Placement Experience Level : 3 Years Start Date : 11/25/2012 Description SENIOR FINANCIAL ANALYST - This is a full-time position located in Miami, FL - Position Description: - The Finance Division in Hospital Department of Ophthalmology has a Senior Financial Analyst position available for immediate hiring. This position will assist with the financial planning, reporting, and analysis of the Specialty Hospitals, as well as, Specialty Hospitals Revenue Cycle. - Responsibilities: * Initial responsibilities will focus on the hospital Department of Ophthalmology Revenue Cycle analysis. * Review and resolution of errors originating in the departments. * Performing of root cause analysis and track denial recoveries. - Qualifications: * Bachelor-s Degree in Finance or related field. * Three years of experience in a Finance/Analyst/Decision Support position required. * Demonstrate outstanding financial analytical skills. * Outstanding Excel skills including: pivot tables, advanced functions (lookup, sumif, cubevalue, etc). - * Effective link management, data organization strategy. * Macros / VBA for applications a substantially advantageous. * Basic knowledge of SQL and OLAP technology is preferred. * Other appropriate combination of relevant education, experience and/or certifications will be considered. -
